myArray.text: WEB DEVELOPER in process, currently studying at Webit Grenaa as a frontend developer. I'm enjoying life as a student again, but am also very eager to get out into the real world and test myself once again. Goal right now is simple: Learn alot quick (and have fun).

JOURNALISM has been my main focus since 2014, where i started my studies at Danish School of Media and Journalism. In 2021, I mostly did stories on technology, the climate and Mark Zuckerberg. Tech grabbed me and pulled me in. 
 Now here I am...
If you want to CONTACT ME - it's very simple. Just click the link below to see all the ways to call, text and socialize with me. I might be a computer-person, but i still (sort of) like people.

radioinner: I loved radio and podcasts, and was lucky enough to be able to make everything from newsstories, long portraits and a podcasts about tech.
paperinner: It's cool to see stories you typed yourself on paper. I did both local newsstories about the cat in the tree to detailed stories about the Facebook leaks.
